title: Food for a Hungry Ghost
description: After moving to Flagler Beach, Florida, life for fifteen-year-old Gala Rhyce has been miserableâ€”that is until she meets Trista, teenage ghost with a fashion sense trapped in the Eighties. The girl's unusual friendship grows, until the ghost demands more than Gala can give and things start to go horribly wrong. Can Gala survive the clutches of a hungry ghost?
author: Becky Pourchot
